alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 3:38AM EST until February 28 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected, mixed at times with sleet and freezing rain. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to a light glaze. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Sussex and Morris. In Pennsylvania, Monroe. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall totals should be at locations above 1500 feet in elevation. Some sleet and freezing rain is also likely to mix in at times for portions of the area.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
